pullRequest.title: Refactor edits
pullRequest.bodyText:
Most of the changes, other than edit.dart, are cosmetic. I reformatted everything. Almost everything in edit.dart was moved from plugin.dart. The classes are new, but the code to implement the edits was copied.
One new thing I've wanted forever is a report of obsolete edit commands.
